title: FriendStatus
content:

name: FriendStatus
type: enum
summary: ''
description: |
  Determines the connection status between two players. This is used by the
  in-game connection request system.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Unknown
    summary: |
      The connection status of two players is unknown.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: NotFriend
    summary: |
      Two players are not connections.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Friend
    summary: |
      Two players are connections.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: FriendRequestSent
    summary: |
      At least one of two players has sent a connection request to the other
      player.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: FriendRequestReceived
    summary: |
      At least one of two players has received a connection request sent by the
      other player.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
